title: Design, synthesis, anticancer and in silico assessment of 8-caffeinyl chalcone hybrid conjugates
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26674-26693
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04787G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mohammad Navid Soltani Rad, Somayeh Behrouz, Maedeh Charbaghi, Marzieh Behrouz, Elham Zarenezhad, Ali Ghanbariasad
Design, synthesis, anticancer, docking, and in silico assessment for 8-caffeinyl chalcone hybrid conjugates are reported. These compounds have potent activities against melanoma and breast cancer cell lines.
